mapper.select: SELECT RC.RECRUIT_CV_NO, R.RECRUIT_TITLE, RC.RECRUIT_CV_PDF_TITLE, RC.RECRUIT_CV_PDF_PATH, TO_CHAR(RC.RECRUIT_CV_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS recruit_cv_date, RC.RECRUIT_CV_EDU, RC.RECRUIT_CV_CAREER, RC.RECRUIT_CV_CHECK_FL FROM RECRUIT_CV RC JOIN RECRUIT R ON RC.RECRUIT_NO = R.RECRUIT_NO ORDER BY R.RECRUIT_TITLE ASC, RC.RECRUIT_CV_NO DESC
